FailedComponent.description: Metadata of submitted components failed to be processed for scanning

Feedback.description: Data Transfer Object for submitting user feedback about a specific report.

reasoning.description: Reasoning or explanation of the report

Image.description: Image data (required if SBOM is not provided)

OverviewMetrics.description: Metrics for the home page calculated from data in the last week

successfullyAnalyzed.description: The count of reports that were completed in the last week (reports with completed_at not null and date within last 7 days)

averageReliabilityScore.description: The average reliability score (intel_score) calculated as sum of all intel_score values divided by the count of completed reports from the last week

falsePositiveRate.description: The percentage of false positives identified from completed reports in the last week, calculated as (reports with output.analysis.0.justification.status='FALSE' / total completed reports) * 100

sbomName.description: SBOM name from first report's metadata.sbom_name

productId.description: Product ID from first report's metadata.product_id

cveId.description: CVE ID from first report's input.scan.vulns[0].vuln_id

cveStatusCounts.description: Map of CVE status to count of reports with that status

statusCounts.description: Map of report status to count of reports with that status

completedAt.description: Completed at timestamp - empty if any report's completed_at is empty, otherwise latest value

submittedAt.description: Submitted at timestamp from first report's metadata.submitted_at

numReports.description: Number of reports in this product group

firstReportId.description: MongoDB document _id (as hex string) of the first report in the group, always populated for navigation purposes

componentStates.description: Map of component analysis states to their counts

cves.description: Map of CVE vulnerabilities and their justifications

cveStatusCounts.description: Map of each CVE to its status counts (status -> count)

startedAt.description: Started at timestamp for report analysis

completedAt.description: Completed at timestamp for report analysis

vulns.description: Vulnerabilities in the report and their analysis results

metadata.description: User provided metadata for the report

ref.description: Git reference (commit hash, tag, or branch) from source_info

reportId.description: ID assigned on scan request submission

id.description: ID assigned on scan request submission (auto-generated if not provided)

vulnerabilities.description: List of vulnerability IDs to analyze

image.description: Image data (required if SBOM is not provided)

sbom.description: SBOM data (required if image is not provided)

sourceRepo.description: Source code repository (required if SBOM is not provided)

commitId.description: Commit ID (required if SBOM is not provided)

reportId.description: ID assigned on scan request submission

vulnerableReportsCount.description: Count of reports containing vulnerable CVEs

nonVulnerableReportsCount.description: Count of reports containing only non-vulnerable CVEs

newReportsTodayCount.description: Count of new reports submitted today

ref.description: Git reference (commit hash, tag, or branch)

include.description: Patterns to include in the analysis

exclude.description: Patterns to exclude from the analysis

UserComments.description: User provided comments on a vulnerability

ValidationErrorResponse.description: Validation error response mapping field names to error messages

errors.description: Map of field names to error messages

comments.description: User provided comments on the vulnerability

jwt.description: Please enter your JWT Token without Bearer

post.summary: Submit user feedback for an AI response
post.description: Submits user feedback for an AI response to the feedback service

get.summary: Check if feedback exists for a report
get.description: Checks if feedback has been submitted for a specific report

post.description: Generates a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for a container image

get.description: Retrieves metrics for the home page calculated from data in the last week, including count of successfully analyzed reports, average reliability score, and false positive rate

post.description: Submits a list of report requests for pre-processing to the Component Syncer

requestBody.description: List of report requests for pre-processing

200.description: Pre-processing request accepted by the Component Syncer

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of reports grouped by product_id, filtered to only include reports with metadata.product_id, sorted by submittedAt, sbomName, or productId

parameters.description: Filter by CVE ID (case-insensitive partial match)
parameters.name: cveId

parameters.description: Filter by SBOM name (case-insensitive partial match)
parameters.name: sbomName

post.description: Accepts a multipart form with CVE ID and CycloneDX file, validates the file structure, creates a report with product ID, and queues it for analysis

202.description: File uploaded and analysis request queued

400.description: Invalid request data (invalid CVE format, invalid JSON, missing required fields)

get.description: Retrieves product data for a specific product ID

sbomName.description: SBOM name from first report's metadata.sbom_name

productId.description: Product ID from first report's metadata.product_id

cveId.description: CVE ID from first report's input.scan.vulns[0].vuln_id

cveStatusCounts.description: Map of CVE status to count of reports with that status

statusCounts.description: Map of report status to count of reports with that status

completedAt.description: Completed at timestamp - empty if any report's completed_at is empty, otherwise latest value

submittedAt.description: Submitted at timestamp from first report's metadata.submitted_at

numReports.description: Number of reports in this product group

firstReportId.description: MongoDB document _id (as hex string) of the first report in the group, always populated for navigation purposes

delete.description: Deletes multiple analysis reports by IDs or using filter parameters

parameters.description: List of report IDs to delete (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: reportIds

post.description: Receives a completed analysis report from Morpheus

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of analysis reports with optional filtering and sorting

parameters.description: Filter by ExploitIQ status. Valid values: TRUE, FALSE, UNKNOWN
parameters.name: exploitIqStatus

parameters.description: Filter by status. Valid values: completed, sent, failed, queued, expired, pending
parameters.name: status

post.description: Creates a new analysis report request, processes it and optionally submits it to ExploitIQ for analysis

parameters.description: Whether to submit to ExploitIQ for analysis
parameters.name: submit

delete.description: Deletes a specific analysis report by ID

parameters.description: Report ID to delete (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific analysis report by ID

parameters.description: Report ID to get (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: id

post.description: Marks an analysis request as failed with error details

parameters.description: Report ID to mark as failed (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: id

post.description: Retries an existing analysis request by ID

parameters.description: Report ID to retry (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: id

post.description: Submits analysis request to ExploitIQ for analysis

parameters.description: Request payload (report) ID to submit (24-character hexadecimal MongoDB ObjectId format)
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of vulnerabilities with optional sorting
Generates a template structure for user comments on vulnerabilities
Retrieves detailed information for a specific vulnerability by ID

delete.description: Deletes a specific vulnerability by ID

get.description: Retrieves user comments for a specific vulnerability by ID
